casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gabriel A. FERRARI 277P18-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019

Gabriel Adrian Ferrari, For Gabriel A. Ferrari

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of January 2019 by Defendant for Strike the Judges Order:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
